seo.seoDescription: Hi there! I'm Son Seungyeol, a developer who deliver thoughts with code.

blocks.heroTitle: Hi there! I'm Son Seungyeol, a developer who deliver thoughts with code.
blocks.heroSubtitle: Glad to meet you! I always try to convey what I think with one line of code written by myself rather than a few words. Also, I believe that one line of code written today makes the world a better place than yesterday.
